info.description: These endpoints are for private use only.
info.title: OncoKB Private APIs

parameters.name: hugoSymbol
parameters.description: The gene symbol used in Human Genome Organisation. Example: BRAF

parameters.name: entrezGeneId
parameters.description: The entrez gene ID. (Higher priority than hugoSymbol). Example: 673

parameters.name: copyNameAlterationType
parameters.description: Copy number alteration type

parameters.name: referenceGenome
parameters.description: Reference genome, either GRCh37 or GRCh38. The default is GRCh37

parameters.name: tumorType
parameters.description: OncoTree(http://oncotree.info) tumor type name. The field supports OncoTree Code, OncoTree Name and OncoTree Main type. Example: Melanoma

parameters.name: evidenceType
parameters.description: DEPRECATED. We do not recommend using this parameter and it will eventually be removed.

400.description: Error, error message will be given.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: List of queries. Please see swagger.json for request body format.

400.description: Error, error message will be given.

parameters.description: Genomic location following TCGA MAF format. Example: 7,140453136,140453136,A,T

parameters.description: The gene symbol A used in Human Genome Organisation. Example: ABL1

parameters.name: entrezGeneIdA
parameters.description: The entrez gene ID A. (Higher priority than hugoSymbolA) Example: 25

parameters.name: hugoSymbolB
parameters.description: The gene symbol B used in Human Genome Organisation.Example: BCR

parameters.name: entrezGeneIdB
parameters.description: The entrez gene ID B. (Higher priority than hugoSymbolB) Example: 613

parameters.description: Structural variant type

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: The search query, it could be hugoSymbol, variant or cancer type. At least two characters. Maximum two keywords are supported, separated by space

parameters.name: limit

parameters.name: entrezGeneId
parameters.description: The entrez gene ID.

parameters.name: hugoSymbol
parameters.description: The gene symbol used in Human Genome Organisation.

parameters.name: variant
parameters.description: Variant name.

parameters.name: tumorType
parameters.description: Tumor type name. OncoTree code is supported.

parameters.name: consequence
parameters.description: Consequence. Possible value: feature_truncation, frameshift_variant, inframe_deletion, inframe_insertion, start_lost, missense_variant, splice_region_variant, stop_gained, synonymous_variant

parameters.name: proteinStart
parameters.description: Protein Start.

parameters.name: proteinEnd
parameters.description: Protein End.

parameters.name: highestLevelOnly
parameters.description: Only show highest level evidences

parameters.name: levelOfEvidence
parameters.description: Separate by comma. LEVEL_1, LEVEL_2A, LEVEL_2B, LEVEL_3A, LEVEL_3B, LEVEL_4, LEVEL_R1, LEVEL_R2, LEVEL_R3

parameters.name: evidenceTypes
parameters.description: Separate by comma. Evidence type includes GENE_SUMMARY, GENE_BACKGROUND, MUTATION_SUMMARY, ONCOGENIC, MUTATION_EFFECT, VUS, PROGNOSTIC_IMPLICATION, DIAGNOSTIC_IMPLICATION, TUMOR_TYPE_SUMMARY, DIAGNOSTIC_SUMMARY, PROGNOSTIC_SUMMARY, STANDARD_THERAPEUTIC_IMPLICATIONS_FOR_DRUG_SENSITIVITY, STANDARD_THERAPEUTIC_IMPLICATIONS_FOR_DRUG_RESISTANCE, INVESTIGATIONAL_THERAPEUTIC_IMPLICATIONS_DRUG_SENSITIVITY, INVESTIGATIONAL_THERAPEUTIC_IMPLICATIONS_DRUG_RESISTANCE

parameters.description: The fields to be returned.

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: The data version

alteration.description: (Nullable) Alteration from original query or the resolved alteration from HGVS variant

canonicalTranscript.description: (Nullable) The OncoKB canonical transcript. See https://www.oncokb.org/cancer-genes

consequence.description: (Nullable) Variant consequence term from Ensembl. See https://useast.ensembl.org/info/genome/variation/prediction/predicted_data.html

entrezGeneId.description: (Nullable) Unique gene identifiers from NCBI. May be null if omitted from original query, otherwise filled in by OncoKB

hgvs.description: (Nullable) The hgvsg or genomic location from original query

hgvsInfo.description: (Nullable) Additional message for "hgvs" field. May indicate reason for failed hgvs annotation.

hugoSymbol.description: (Nullable) The gene symbol used in Human Genome Organisation

id.description: (Nullable) The id passed in request for the user to distinguish the query.

referenceGenome.description: Reference genome build version. Defaulted to GRCh37

tumorType.description: (Nullable) Oncotree tumor type name, code, or main type.

abstracts.description: List of abstracts cited to support the level of evidence. Defaulted to empty list

alterations.description: List of alterations associated with implication

pmids.description: List of PubMed IDs cited to support the level of evidence. Defaulted to empty list

children.description: Map from parent tumor type to children tumor types

level.description: Oncotree tumor type level. -1 indicates special tumor types (See SpecialTumorTypes.java)

alleleExist.description: Indicates whether the alternate allele has been curated. See SOP Protocol 9.1

diagnosticImplications.description: List of diagnostic implications. Defaulted to empty list

exon.description: (Nullable) The affected exon of this variant, if applicable (currently only supported when annotating via HGVSg or Genomic Location)

geneExist.description: Indicates whether the gene is curated by OncoKB

highestDiagnosticImplicationLevel.description: (Nullable) The highest diagnostic level from a list of diagnostic evidences.

highestFdaLevel.description: (Nullable) The highest FDA level from a list of therapeutic evidences.

highestPrognosticImplicationLevel.description: (Nullable) The highest prognostic level from a list of prognostic evidences.

highestResistanceLevel.description: (Nullable) The highest resistance level from a list of therapeutic evidences.

highestSensitiveLevel.description: (Nullable) The highest sensitivity level from a list of therapeutic evidences.

hotspot.description: Whether variant is recurrently found in cancer with statistical significance, as defined in Chang et al. (2017). See SOP Protocol 9.2

lastUpdate.description: OncoKB data release date. Formatted as MM/DD/YYYY

oncogenic.description: The oncogenicity status of the variant. Defaulted to "Unknown".

prognosticImplications.description: List of prognostic implications. Defaulted to empty list

treatments.description: List of therapeutic implications implications. Defaulted to empty list

variantExist.description: Indicates whether an exact match for the queried variant is curated

alleleExist.description: Indicates whether the alternate allele has been curated. See SOP Protocol 9.1

diagnosticImplications.description: List of diagnostic implications. Defaulted to empty list

exon.description: (Nullable) The affected exon of this variant, if applicable (currently only supported when annotating via HGVSg or Genomic Location)

geneExist.description: Indicates whether the gene is curated by OncoKB

highestDiagnosticImplicationLevel.description: (Nullable) The highest diagnostic level from a list of diagnostic evidences.

highestFdaLevel.description: (Nullable) The highest FDA level from a list of therapeutic evidences.

highestPrognosticImplicationLevel.description: (Nullable) The highest prognostic level from a list of prognostic evidences.

highestResistanceLevel.description: (Nullable) The highest resistance level from a list of therapeutic evidences.

highestSensitiveLevel.description: (Nullable) The highest sensitivity level from a list of therapeutic evidences.

lastUpdate.description: OncoKB data release date. Formatted as MM/DD/YYYY

prognosticImplications.description: List of prognostic implications. Defaulted to empty list

treatments.description: List of therapeutic implications implications. Defaulted to empty list

variantExist.description: Indicates whether an exact match for the queried variant is curated

abstracts.description: List of abstracts cited in the treatment description. Defaulted to empty list

alterations.description: List of alterations associated with therapeutic implication

drugs.description: List of drugs associated with therapeutic implication

levelAssociatedCancerType.description: Cancer type associated with level of evidence

levelExcludedCancerTypes.description: Excluded cancer types. Defaulted to empty list

pmids.description: List of PubMed IDs cited in the treatment description. Defaulted to empty list

citations.description: Mutation effect-relevant PMIDs, Abstracts, and other citation sources

description.description: A brief overview of the biological and oncogenic effect of the variant. Defaulted to ""

knownEffect.description: Indicates the effect of the mutation on the gene. Defaulted to ""
